name: Grandma's Macaroni Salad
author: Hope
summary: A sweet macaroni salad just like Grandma used to make. The dressing is a good basic macaroni salad dressing that you can use with your own macaroni salad recipe. You must refrigerate for at least 4 hours for all of the flavors to blend together.
ingredients: ½ cup finely chopped green bell pepper
¼ cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes
Drain well; rinse with cold water and drain again
Reserve 2 tablespoons relish juice; place the rest in a large bowl with onion, bell pepper, carrot, and egg
Whisk creamy salad dressing into reserved relish juice
Mix in sour cream, milk, sugar, dill, salt, and pepper
Fold gently into the macaroni mixture
Refrigerate to let flavors blend, 4 to 24 hours
